Dear all.
At netarchive.dk (http://netarchive.dk/index-en.php), we modify t=
he
order.xml using templates before calling Heritrix.
I would very much lik=
e to have tools for verifying that the modifcations
performed are valid:
It=
 is easy enough to verify, that the resulting order.xml is valid xml,
 but =
I also like to know whether the classes in the order.xml exist and can
be i=
nstantiated without actually starting the crawler.

Any suggestions are ver=
y welcome!
Regards
